page.para: Hip/po wants to dance. She jumps a/round on the ground.
Mil/li/pede is try/ing to sleep. He wants Hip/po to go a/way.
Hip/po wants to dance. She splash/es in the riv/er.
King/fish/er is get/ting wet. He wants Hip/po to go a/way.
Hip/po wants to dance. She doesnâ€™t mind the mud.
Meer/kat is wash/ing his ba/bies. He wants Hip/po to go a/way.
No one wants Hip/po a/round. The tears run down her cheeks.
The tears fall on grass/hop/per. He be/gins to dance.
Hip/po has found a friend. They dance to/geth/er all day long.
Now all the an/i/mals are danc/ing. Do you like danc/ing too?
